Posts.Content: How awful that your son and dil can treat you like that! Look after yourself, banish the negative people in your life, treat yourself and live your life for you!! And I love the will idea! Xx
Posts.Title: Bit Scared and a Lot Angry

Posts.Content: Wow I'm amazed that different hospitals operate so differently! I have had several ultrasounds since starting neo-aduvent chemo - one after first cycle, then after 4th (both EC) then another one as I missed 6 weeks chemo due to low bloods, illness ect then Iv had another after 2 rounds of Carbo/Paxil and then due one more the day after my lady chemo in Feb! I also had a marker put next to my lump on my diagnosis but have never had an MRI?Â
Posts.Title: Neo adjuvant chemotherapy, midway scan

Posts.Content: Hi I have had a pick line fitted which was pulled out too far by the district nurse, tried to have another refitted but veins were too bad so then had a groshon line fitted which I think is the same a port? Haven't had to pay for either of them so strange she is being asked too! Have you queried this with your hospital PAL or compliants Team? X
